body_content.explanation: the action of juggling objects (= throwing and catching several of them at the same time) in order to entertain people:
examples: The Chinese circus includes aerial dance, double trapeze and juggling.

body_content.explanation: the activity of trying to manage your life or job when you are involved in several different activities that all demand your time:
examples: The point is not just to help women do the "juggling" but to acknowledge that caring is a vital contribution to the economy.
